definition.achievementDescription: Obtain a standard Expansion Currency item.
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="item_consumed" x="16" y="8"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value"></field></block></value></block><block type="item_in_inventory" x="-3" y="120"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10000000</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CURRENCY</field></block></value><next><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false"></block></next></block></xml>
